summary: This module implements DVC ignore handling. It loads ignore patterns from configuration files, normalizes and matches paths, and provides callable objects and filters to decide whether a given file or directory should be excluded from DVC tracking. It also offers utilities for listing and walking repository contents while respecting those ignore rules.
business_intent: Enable DVC to respect user-defined ignore rules (e.g., .dvcignore) so that unwanted files are omitted from data versioning operations, improving repository cleanliness and performance.
